net.happybrackets.device.sensors.gpio

Class GPIOInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.device.sensors.gpio.GPIO
      • net.happybrackets.device.sensors.gpio.GPIOInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GPIOInputListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GPIOInputSimulator, RaspbianGPIOInput

    public abstract class GPIOInput
extends GPIO
implements GPIOInputListener
    Class for detecting GPIO input changes

      • getInputPin

        public static GPIOInput getInputPin(int gpio_number)
        Get a GPIO input pin. There will be no Pullup resistance defined
        Parameters:
        gpio_number - the GPIO number
        Returns:
        the GPIO Pin if it is available, otherwise null

      • getInputPin

        public static GPIOInput getInputPin(int gpio_number,
                                    com.pi4j.io.gpio.PinPullResistance pinPullResistance)
        Get a GPIO input pin.
        Parameters:
        gpio_number - the Pin Number
        pinPullResistance - the Pullup type for the input. Will only count if the pin has not already been created in another sketch
        Returns:
        If an input pin already exists for that pin number or we were able to create it, will return the GPIOInput. If not, will retrun null
